Title: Lucy Official Trailer #1 (2014) - Scarlett Johansson Movie HD
Comment:
from Indonesia: I've just watched this movie few days ago. I will definitely watch it again for the 2nd time.

the movie is not just great in the concept, theme, story, and *at least* does its job in making you thinking (for those who love thinking, of course ) ,
but also it's very rich visually, and artistically.

the Music in the movie is also very beautiful (many classical, orchestral, & choir arrangements, which is sadly/unfortunately very rarely heard nowadays in all other "blockbuster/Hollywood" movies that are often just too 'noisy' but lacking substance, depth, & deeper Meanings).

this is why IMHO "Lucy" is not just a 'movie' to me personally; it's an Art.
